reviewText: Thanks the vhs was in excellent condition
Please bring this to dvd.  This is such a great show and not many have vcrs anymore.  I am sure that it would be a hit on dvd.  Thank you.
I too wish these were on DVD. I managed to watch a bunch of them on a long special and they're hysterical.
I bought this movie so that my family could have the Hillbilly Bears experience that I did as a child.  I would recommend this movie to anyone.  I loved the Hillbilly Bears as a child.
I totally wish they would put all the hillbilly bear episodes on dvd. I haven't seen them in forever and would love to be able to watch them again
